name: English (US)
popup_ffmpeg_msg:
FFmpeg not found. Choose one of the options below:

 • Specify path: If FFmpeg is already installed, indicate the location of the executable
 • Install via Chocolatey: Install automatically using the package manager
 • Download manually: Open the official website for download and installation

After installation, you'll need to specify the path in the settings.
playlist_check_tooltip: Check this option if it is a playlist.
playlist_items_tooltip:
Choose which videos you want to download from the playlist!
 • Specific videos: Enter the numbers separated by commas.
  - Example: 1, 5, 7 → Downloads videos 1, 5, and 7.
 • Ranges: Use a hyphen to select a sequence of videos.
  - Example: 5-10 → Downloads videos from 5 to 10.
 • Combine formats: You can mix both methods.
  - Example: 1, 3-5, 8 → Downloads videos 1, 3, 4, 5, and 8.
Leave it blank to download all videos from the playlist.
playlist_reverse_tooltip: Download the playlist items in reverse order
playlist_random_tooltip: Download the playlist items in random order
errors: Please enter a valid path to ffmpeg.exe.
donwload_path_tooltip: This is where files will be saved whenever the program starts, unless an alternative path is specified during download.
check_open_folder_tooltip: Open the folder where the media was downloaded.
popup_update_msg:
A new version of EasyTuber is available: {version}.
Do you want to update now?
popup_reset_msg: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
